name: Chicki Chick
description:
It's a simple and fun app with a simple interface. All you have to do is open the app and tap the play bottom to play the game. While you playing all you have to do is tap on the screen or press and hold to go throw the gaps left and right. You can also listen to music while playing the game or on lock-screens.

If you made it one thousand, that's mean game over we will congratulate you and you will get a diamond. You don't have to sign up or login. All you have to do is open the app and play right away.

Chicki Chick is available for iPads and tablets for FREE!
